name: Casino Sim (Xi-Xi Kaisoku)
description:
Casino sim is an interactable single player casino game. This game was designed to be more of a practice game, giving people access to unlimited funds to try games out and see how they and betting worked. This game includes 5 classic casino games in single player form including craps, poker, blackjack, roulette, and slots. Complete with the ability to make bets and get accurate returns on winnings based on the game, clearly shown on every board.

This game was made for the PC using WPF. This game was made by our team of 5 in 2 weeks. Developed by me, Matthew Stewart, Nicholas Conforth, Ethan Wilson, and Sebastian Cushman.
